documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
This privacy policy (Policy) contains information regarding the processing of your personal information, your privacy rights and our use of cookies.

Anime-Planet understands the importance of protecting your information. We recognize that when you choose to provide us with information about yourself, you trust us to use it in a responsible manner. This Policy applies to any information provided or collected through our website https://www.anime-planet.com/ (Website) and outlines how Anime-Planet as a data controller collects, processes, uses and discloses the information you provide by using the Website.

We will use your personal information only for the purposes and in the manner set forth in this Policy, which describes the steps we take to ensure our processing of your personal information is in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation ((EU) 2016/679).

You can also help protect your personal information. The United States federal government has developed practical tips to help you guard against Internet fraud, secure your computer and protect your personal information: http://www.onguardonline.gov/. Please consult these tips to be certain you are doing everything you can to protect your personal information.

Personal Information We Collect about You

"Personal information" means any information about a person from which that person can be identified. We only collect personal information about you on our Website which you volunteer by using the Website. When you visit or use our Website, we collect and process information as outlined below:

  • Email Address. Email addresses are used to verify the identity of the person who is registering on the Website. We may also use the email address that you provide to send you emails regarding important updates, as well as additional information and notifications (subject to opting out in the profile settings) related to your continued use of the Website. Email addresses may also be used to prevent spam and to report other illegal activities to the appropriate authorities.
  • Username and Password. Usernames and passwords are used to uniquely identify you as a user on the Website, and allow you to use your account and keep it secure. Usernames may also be used to prevent spam and to report other illegal activities to the appropriate authorities.
  • Gender and Location. Your gender and location are both optional types of information that you can supply to make your profile more complete. We currently only process this to display it on your profile.
  • "Last visited" time and Registration Date. "Last visited" time and registration date may be used as part of account recovery processes should the automated account recovery fail.
  • IP Address. This information is used to keep logs of access to the Website to prevent abuse and is used to maintain our network security as part of our efforts to protect your data.
  • Activity Feed. Some functionality of the Website relies on data observed from your other interactions with the Website (rather than being directly provided by you). One such example is the activity feed where we use your activity on the Website to build a feed of activity on the Website that other users (also known as "friends") can follow.
  • Changes to your Anime and Manga Lists. The changes made to your anime and manga lists are observed to provide you with the functionality seen as part of the challenges feature. This information is tracked regardless of your participation in a challenge to increase the accuracy of the contents of the challenges.

By using the Website, you provide us with most of the information above. For example, by registering you provide us with a username, an email address and a password. By connecting to the Website, you provide us with an IP address that will be logged for as long as needed to ensure the safety of the Website and its data. Any information that you provide in the various fields on the site may be stored this way (which includes but is not limited to, your forum posts, comments, custom lists and similar content).

Children

The Website is not intended for children. If you are a citizen of a country in the European Economic Area (which includes the European Union), and any other included country or territory (collectively referred to as the European Region), you must be at least 16 years old (or such greater age required in your country) to register use the Website. If you are a citizen of a country except those in the European Region, you must be at least 13 years old (or such greater age required in your country) to use the Website. Certain portions of the Website may be restricted to users who are at least 18 years of age. Anime-Planet does not knowingly collect data relating to children under 13 (or 16 in the case of the European Economic Area). If you are under the age of 13 (or 16 in the case of the European Economic Area), please do not attempt to register with us at this Website or provide any personal information about yourself to us. If a parent or guardian becomes aware that his or her child has provided us with personal information without their consent, he or she should contact us at privacy@anime-planet.com. If we become aware that a child under 13 (or 16 in the case of the European Economic Area) has provided us with personal information, we will promptly delete such information.

Cookies and Log Data

Anime-Planet may set and access Anime-Planet cookies on your computer. A cookie is a small data file that we transfer to your computer's hard disk for record-keeping purposes. We use "persistent cookies" to save your username and login password for future logins to the Website. We use "session ID cookies" to enable certain features of the service available through the Website (Service), to better understand how you interact with the Service and to monitor web traffic routing on the Website and aggregate usage of the Service. You can instruct your browser, by changing its options, to stop accepting cookies or to prompt you before accepting a cookie from the websites you visit. If you do not accept cookies, however, you may not be able to use all portions of the Website or all functionality of the Service.

Anime-Planet uses third-party advertising companies to serve ads and collect information when you visit our site. These companies may use cookies to collect information (such as which ads you have seen already or which ads you have clicked) in order to provide additional advertisements. If you would like more information and to know how to opt-out, see http://optout.networkadvertising.org.

In addition, as you use the Website, our servers automatically record information that the browser sends (Log Data). Log Data may include, but is not limited to, your computer's IP address, browser type, the web page you were visiting before you came to the Website and information you search for on a site.

Information Sharing By Anime-Planet

Anime-Planet does not rent, sell, or share personal information about you with other people or non-affiliated companies except to provide products or services you've requested, when we have your permission, or under the following circumstances:

  • We provide the information to partners who work on behalf of or with Anime-Planet under confidentiality agreements. These companies may use your personal information in connection with Anime-Planet's provision of the Service to you. They may also communicate with you about offers from Anime-Planet and our marketing partners. However, these companies do not have any independent right to share this information.
  • We respond to subpoenas, court orders, or legal process, or to establish or exercise our legal rights or defend against legal claims.
  • We believe it is necessary to share information in order to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the physical safety of any person, violations of Anime-Planet's terms of use posted on the Website (Terms of Use), or as otherwise required by law.
  • We may transfer information about you if Anime-Planet is acquired by or merged with another company. In such event, Anime-Planet will notify you, via an announcement on our Website, before information about you is transferred and becomes subject to a different privacy policy.

Anime-Planet displays targeted advertisements based on personal information. Advertisers (including ad serving companies) may assume that people who interact with, view, or click targeted ads meet the targeting criteria—for example, women ages 18-24 from a particular geographic area.

  • Anime-Planet does not provide any personal information to the advertiser when you interact with or view a targeted ad. However, by interacting with or viewing an ad, you are consenting to the possibility that the advertiser will make the assumption that you meet the targeting criteria used to display the ad.
  • Anime-Planet advertisers include financial service providers (such as banks, insurance agents, stock brokers and mortgage lenders) and non-financial companies (such as stores, airlines, and software companies).

We may share aggregated information that includes non-identifying information with third parties for industry analysis, demographic profiling, and to deliver targeted advertising about other products and services. Any aggregated information shared in these contexts will not contain your personal information.

Information Sharing By You

Please be aware that when you register to become an Anime-Planet member, post recommendations and reviews, register for and/or participate in forums and create personal lists such as lists of favorite characters, personal anime/manga lists, etc., other users are able to see that information, including any information that you provide about you, location, gender, birth date and/or age, your screen or user name, in addition to any comments or submissions that you post or submit. We recommend that you guard your anonymity and sensitive information and that you not use your real name as your screen or user name to the extent that allows others to identify you.

Your Ability to Edit and Delete Your Account Information and Preferences

You can edit your Anime-Planet account information by going to the "Edit Profile" page when you are logged into the Website. You can delete your Anime-Planet account information by going to the "Contact Us" page and selecting "Delete my account" from the "Subject" dropdown box.

We reserve the right to send you certain communications relating to the Service, such as service announcements, administrative messages and notifications that are considered part of your Anime-Planet account, without offering you the opportunity to opt out of receiving them.

After you delete your account, we may continue to post any recommendations, synopses, descriptions, reviews, ratings, lists, contest related information, comments and other information and data you posted through or in connection with your access to the Website. In addition, we may reserve certain of your account information for the purpose of collecting and using aggregate statistical information related to our users generally, but without reference to any of your personal information. In addition, after your account is deleted, Anime-Planet may retain posts you made in a forum but will attribute those posts to a "guest" and not to you.

Your Rights Regarding Your Personal Information

You have rights under privacy and data protection laws related to the data we process about you. We will honor the requests you make related to your rights as the law allows, which means in some cases there may be legal or other official reasons that we may not be able to address the specific request you make related to your rights. You may:

  • request access to the personal information we process about you
  • request that we correct inaccurate or incomplete personal information about you
  • request deletion of personal information about you
  • request restrictions, temporarily or permanently, on our processing of some or all personal information about you
  • request transfer of personal information to you or a third party where we process the data based on your consent or a contract with you, and where our processing is automated
  • opt-out or object to our use of personal information about you where our use is based on your consent or our legitimate interests.
Bases for Processing Your Personal Information

We rely on a number of legal bases to collect, use, share, and otherwise process the information we have about you for the purposes described in this Policy, including:

  • as necessary to provide the Service and fulfill our obligations pursuant to the Terms of Use located on the Website
  • where you have consented to the processing, which you can revoke at any time
  • where necessary to comply with a legal obligation, a court order, or to exercise and defend legal claims
  • to protect your vital interests, or those of others, such as in the case of emergencies
  • where you have made the information public
  • where necessary in the public interest
  • where necessary for the purposes of our legitimate interests. Our legitimate interests include:
    • providing and improving the Service.
    • keeping the Service safe and secure.
    • You have the right to object to processing of your personal information where the processing is carried on for our legitimate interests.
Information Transfers

The Website is operated from the United States. If you are located outside of the United States and choose to use the Website or provide information to us, you acknowledge and understand that your information will be transferred, processed and stored in the United States, as it is necessary to provide the Service and perform the Terms of Service. United States privacy laws may not be as protective as those in your jurisdiction.

Links to Third-Party Sites

This Policy does not apply to the practices of people or companies that may be referenced on our Website, including but not limited to advertisers, affiliates, partners, and people that Anime-Planet does not employ or manage. The Website may contain links to other third-party websites. If you choose to visit an advertiser by "clicking on" a banner ad or other type of advertisement, or by clicking on another third-party link, you will be directed to that third party's website. The fact that we link to a website or present a banner ad or other type of advertisement is not an endorsement, authorization or representation that we are affiliated with that third party, nor is it an endorsement of their privacy or information security policies or practices. We do not exercise control over third-party websites. Those other third-party websites may place their own cookies or other files on your computer, collect data or solicit personal information from you. Other third-party websites and services have their own policies regarding the use or disclosure of the personal information that you submit to them. We encourage you to read the privacy policies or statements of the other third-party websites you visit.

Changes to this Policy

Anime-Planet may update this Policy from time to time in our discretion. If we make any changes, we will post those changes here and update the "Last Revised" date at the top of this Policy. Your continued use of the Website after we make changes is considered acceptance of those changes, so please check this Policy periodically for updates.

Feedback

If you have questions, comments, requests or complaints regarding this Policy and the personal information that we process, please contact us at privacy@anime-planet.com.

documents.name: Terms of Use
documents.text:
Anime-Planet, including its successor or assigns ("Anime-Planet" or "we" or "us") owns and operates the website "Anime-Planet.com" (including all features and services, the "Site"). The Site permits users ("Users") to do the following things: view and obtain information about animated series and related media, including reviews and recommendations, create reviews and recommendations, chat with other Anime-Planet users, and participate in discussions and other social media features, contests, and promotions related to anime.

The following are the Terms of Use ("TOU" or "Agreement") for the Site. We reserve the right to modify the TOU at any time. Your continuing use of the Site manifests your willingness to be bound by the TOU and/or any changes we make to the TOU. We will change the "Last Updated" date at the top of this page every time we modify the TOU. If you do not wish to be bound by the TOU you may discontinue your use of the Site at any time. Please check the TOU regularly to keep informed of any changes we may make to them.

YOU UNDERSTAND THAT BY USING THE SITE, REGISTERING TO BECOME A PART OF THE ANIME-PLANET COMMUNITY ON THE SITE ("REGISTER" OR "REGISTRATION") OR BY POSTING ANY CONTENT ON THE SITE OR REQUESTING THAT ANIME-PLANET POST SUCH CONTENT, YOU ARE AGREEING TO BE BOUND BY THE TOU.

IF YOU AGREE TO THE TOU ON BEHALF OF A BUSINESS, YOU REPRESENT AND WARRANT THAT YOU HAVE THE AUTHORITY TO BIND THAT BUSINESS TO THE TOU AND YOUR AGREEMENT TO THE TOU WILL BE TREATED AS THE AGREEMENT OF THE BUSINESS. IN THAT EVENT, "YOU" AND "YOUR" WILL REFER AND APPLY TO THAT BUSINESS.

IF YOU DO NOT ACCEPT THE TOU IN THEIR ENTIRETY, YOU MAY NOT ACCESS OR USE THE SITE.

Void Where Prohibited. Use of the Site is void where prohibited.

Privacy. Your privacy is very important to us. See how we collect and use your personal information in our Privacy Policy, which is incorporated into the TOU by this reference.

Applicability. Third Party Website and Links. The TOU apply only to the Site. They do not apply to any third party websites to which the Site may link, or to any other related sites from which you may have come to the Site or which cover a similar topic area. We recommend that you carefully review the terms of use of every website that you visit to keep apprised of the conditions that govern your use of that website.

Additional terms and conditions may apply to specific portions or features of the Site, including contests, promotions or other similar features, all of which terms are made a part of the TOU by this reference. You agree to abide by such other terms and conditions, including where applicable representing that you are of sufficient legal age to use or participate in such service or feature. If there is a conflict between the TOU and the terms posted for or applicable to a specific portion of the Site or for any service offered on or through the Site, the latter terms shall control with respect to your use of that portion of the Site or the specific service.

Registration. Some portions of the Site require you to register prior to obtaining access. We may post additional rules or guidelines in connection with those portions of the Site, and your use of them must be consistent with those rules/guidelines, in addition to being consistent with the TOU. You understand that not all features accessible via registration may be available indefinitely. For example, you may register to be able to create a custom list of favorite anime on the Site or to post other lists and/or content. You understand that such lists and content may not always be available and Anime-Planet reserves the right to delete any or all of the foregoing if it deems doing so is necessary to comply with applicable law or third party rights.

To Register, you must:

  • be at least 13 years of age, and certain portions of the Site may be restricted to registered users who are at least 18 years of age. If you are a citizen of a country in the European Economic Area (which includes the European Union), and any other included country or territory (collectively referred to as the European Region), you must be at least 16 years old (or such greater age required in your country) to register or use the Site.
  • provide Anime-Planet with accurate and complete information.
  • not impersonate any other person, or use a username or password that you are not authorized to use.
  • safeguard and maintain the confidentiality of your username, password and corresponding account information. and
  • not disclose your username, password or account information to anyone.

You agree that you are entirely and solely responsible for any and all activities or actions that occur under your account, whether or not you have authorized such activities or actions. You agree to immediately notify Anime-Planet of any unauthorized use of your username, password or account. Anime-Planet reserves the right to require you to change your username or password for any reason and may do so at any time. You agree not to share your username and/or password with any third party and you will not use the username, password, or other information of another User.

Interactions With Other Users. You are solely responsible for your interactions (including any disputes) with other Users. You understand that we do not screen Users. Your use of the Site, and any other content made available through the Site is at your sole risk and discretion. You agree to cooperate fully with Anime-Planet to investigate any suspected unlawful, fraudulent or improper activity, including, without limitation, granting authorized Anime-Planet representatives access to any password-protected portions of your account.

Term and Termination. This Agreement remains in effect with respect to your use of the Site even after your Registration is deleted or you leave the Site.

If we determine that you have violated the TOU or pose a threat to Anime-Planet, its affiliates or other Users, we reserve the right to, in our sole discretion:

  • reject, refuse to post, or remove any posting by you or any other party for any reason and at any time.
  • deny, restrict, suspend, or terminate your access to all or any part of the Site at any time, for any reason, or for no reason, with or without prior notice or explanation, and without liability.
  • remove and/or delete your Registration. and/or
  • notify authorities or take any actions we deem appropriate, with or without notice to you.

Anime-Planet will not be liable to you or any third party for termination of the Site or termination of your use. UPON ANY TERMINATION OR SUSPENSION, ANY CONTENT, MATERIALS OR INFORMATION THAT YOU HAVE SUBMITTED ON THE SITE OR WHICH IS RELATED TO YOUR ACCOUNT MAY NO LONGER BE ACCESSED BY YOU, SUBJECT TO YOUR RIGHTS AS OUTLINED IN OUR PRIVACY POLICY.

Any suspension, termination or cancellation will not affect your obligations to Anime-Planet under the TOU (including, without limitation, proprietary rights and ownership, indemnification and limitation of liability), which by their sense and context are intended to survive such suspension, termination or cancellation.

You acknowledge and agree that Anime-Planet may preserve and disclose information available on the Site if required to do so by law, or if Anime-Planet determines that such preservation or disclosure is reasonably necessary to (1) comply with legal process, (2) enforce the TOU, (3) respond to claims that any such data violates the rights of others, or (4) protect the rights, property or personal safety of Anime-Planet, its employees, users of or visitors to the Site, and the public.

You may terminate your Anime-Planet Registration at any time and for any reason by contacting us via Contact Us and using the 'Delete my account' option in the dropdown box. Upon any such termination, your account will no longer be accessible. however, Anime-Planet may, in its discretion, continue to post any recommendations, synopses, descriptions, reviews, ratings, lists, contest related information, comments and other information and data you posted through or in connection with your access to the Site.

Our Rights to the Site, Badges, Tags, Articles and Other Content and Your Feedback. Anime-Planet and its licensors reserve all right, title, and interest in and to the name Anime-Planet, anime-planet.com, and to any and all trademarks, logos, text, data, graphics, music, sounds, code and designs associated with our name or with the Site, including but not limited to the look and feel of the Site, theme images, badges and tags, articles, reviews, recommendations, synopses, and descriptions we post and/or make available on the Site, articles and reviews, and any and all services and their underlying functionality which are or may be provided on the Site (individually and collectively, the "Anime-Planet Content"). In addition, Anime-Planet reserves all rights to feedback you may provide regarding the Site, if applicable. By submitting any feedback, you agree that your submission is gratuitous, unsolicited and without restriction and will not place Anime-Planet under any fiduciary or other obligation, that we are free to disclose any such feedback on a non-confidential basis to anyone or otherwise use such feedback without any additional compensation to you. You acknowledge that, by acceptance of your submission, Anime-Planet does not waive any rights to use similar or related ideas previously known to it, or developed by its employees, or obtained from sources other than you.

All rights not otherwise granted under the TOU are reserved by Anime-Planet and its suppliers.

You will not remove, alter or conceal any copyright, trademark, service mark or other proprietary rights notices incorporated in or accompanying the Site, the Anime-Planet Content, any other content made available through the Site or related products and services, and except as explicitly described herein, you will not reproduce, modify, adapt, prepare derivative works based on, perform, display, publish, distribute, transmit, broadcast, sell, license or otherwise exploit the Site, the Anime-Planet Content or any other content made available through the Site.

Roles, Reviewers, Moderators, etc. From time to time, Anime-Planet may designate certain Users to provide reviews, moderate discussions and commentary related to anime, Anime-Planet Content, User content and/or third party content. Such designation shall not be construed as an endorsement of the authority of any such User as an authority with respect to such subject matter or otherwise. In addition, such designation may be granted and revoked by Anime-Planet, in its sole discretion, at any time.

Responsibility for Your Content and the Content of Other Users. You are solely responsible for any ratings, recommendations, lists, comments, posts, reviews, synopses, images, articles, text, data, graphics and other content and material that you submit, publish or display on the Anime-Planet Site or transmit to other members and/or other Users (hereinafter, "Content").

You may not:

  • post, distribute, or reproduce in any way any copyrighted material, trademarks, or other proprietary information without obtaining the prior written consent of the owner of such proprietary rights.
  • submit any Content or material that infringes, misappropriates or violates the intellectual property, publicity, privacy or other rights of any party.
  • provide any Content that falsely states or implies that such Content or material is sponsored or endorsed by Anime-Planet. or
  • provide any Content that is unlawful or that promotes or encourages illegal activity or which violates the TOU.

Anime-Planet reserves the right in its sole discretion, but has no obligation, to monitor your Content and the content posted by others, and may modify, suspend and/or remove such content or any portion thereof at any time, and/or to investigate and take appropriate legal action against anyone who or whose Content violates the TOU in its sole discretion (such action may include termination of the Registration and/or blocking your use of the Site). Anime-Planet does not review and cannot verify or warrant the accuracy of any content posted by Users.

You may not post Content that:

  • is false or intentionally misleading, including but not limited to falsely marking Site content in a manner that distorts Site statistics or other Site results (e.g. increasing the Site counters, lowering or increasing ratings, etc.).
  • is patently offensive to users of the Site, such as Content or messages that promote racism, bigotry, hatred, or physical harm of any kind against any group or individual.
  • harasses or advocates harassment of another person, including but not limited to negative comments related to other Users.
  • involves the transmission of unsolicited mass mailing or "spamming".
  • violates the intellectual property or other rights of any person.
  • promotes illegal activities or conduct that is abusive.
  • promotes activities or websites that violate international copyright laws.
  • is threatening, obscene, defamatory or libelous.
  • is pornographic or sexually explicit in nature. and
  • seeks or recommends providers of material that exploits people under the age of 18 in a sexual or violent manner, or seeks or recommends providers that solicit personal information from anyone under 18.

You acknowledge and agree that Anime-Planet may, at its option, reclassify or re-categorize any Content and establish limits concerning Content, including, without limitation, the maximum number of days that Content will remain available via the Site, the maximum size of any files that may be stored on or uploaded to the Site and the maximum disk space that may be allotted to you for the storage of Content on our servers. Although Anime-Planet exercises commercially reasonable efforts to ensure that legitimate data stored on its servers is not lost, Anime-Planet will have no responsibility or liability for maintaining copies of your Content on our servers, and you are solely responsible for creating backups of your Content.

Ownership and use of your Content. By posting Content on the Site, you hereby grant, and you represent and warrant that you have the right to grant Anime-Planet, its partners and affiliates, successors and assigns (individually and collectively, the "Anime-Planet Parties") an irrevocable, perpetual, royalty-free, fully sub-licensable, fully paid up, worldwide license to modify, use, copy, publicly perform, digitally perform, publicly display, reformat, translate, excerpt (wholly or partially), sell and distribute your Content, with or without personal reference to you, to prepare derivative works of, and incorporate into other works, such Content. The foregoing license includes, without limitation, the right to share your Content with third parties for any purpose, commercial, advertising, or otherwise, on or in connection with the Anime-Planet Parties and/or the Site or the promotion thereof, to prepare derivative works of, or incorporate into other works, Your Content, and to grant and authorize sublicenses of the foregoing. In addition, you grant such license even with reference to you as necessary to enable Anime-Planet to permit you to use and access the Site, including your sharing your Content with other Users of the Site. This license is non-exclusive, except you agree that Anime-Planet shall have the exclusive right to practice this license to the extent of combining your Content with materials, designs, or other content of Anime-Planet, its partners and affiliates or of other Users.

Notwithstanding anything set forth herein, Anime-Planet shall own, and you hereby transfer and assign to Anime-Planet, all right, title and interest in and to (i) any Content you create which derives, directly or indirectly, from the Anime-Planet Content, including but not limited to, themes, site skins, templates, (ii) any Content which you create at Anime-Planet's request or with Anime-Planet's direction, including but not limited to any Content you create in connection with contests or promotions sponsored by the Site. and (iii) Anime/Manga synopses and character, person or other descriptions you submit for Anime-Planet's use on the Site.

User Obligations. You agree that, while using the Site, you will comply with all applicable laws and regulations You will not use the Site in any of the following ways:

  • upload, post, transmit, share, store or otherwise make available on the Site any of the following:
    • unsolicited advertising, solicitations, promotional materials, "junk mail," "spam," "chain letters," "pyramid schemes," or any other form of solicitation.
    • any personal information of any third party, including, addresses, phone numbers, email addresses, Social Security numbers and credit card numbers without their consent.
    • software viruses or any other computer code, files or programs designed to interrupt, destroy or limit the functionality of any computer software or hardware or telecommunications equipment.
    • content that would constitute, encourage or provide instructions for a criminal offense, violate the rights of any party, or that would otherwise create liability or violate any local, state, national or international law, including any material that infringes any copyright, patent, trademark, trade secret or other proprietary rights of any person or entity.
  • inappropriately solicit personal information, or otherwise solicit passwords or personally identifying information for commercial or unlawful purposes.
  • intimidate or harass another.
  • harvest, collect, or otherwise gather personal or contact information, including email addresses, of other Users by electronic or other means in order to send unsolicited emails or other unsolicited communications in any form.
  • disable, otherwise impair, overburden, or damage the Site.
  • use any sort of technology, including automated scripts, to collect information from or otherwise interact with the Site.
  • use Anime-Planet to do anything unlawful, misleading, malicious, or discriminatory.
  • use any "deep-link", "page-scrape", "robot", "spider" or other automatic device, program, algorithm or methodology, or any similar or equivalent manual process, to access, acquire, copy or monitor any portion of the Site or any Content, or in any way reproduce or circumvent the navigational structure or presentation of the Site or any Content, to obtain or attempt to obtain any materials, documents or information through any means not purposely made available through the Site.
  • probe, scan or test the vulnerability of the Site or any network connected to the Site, nor breach the security or authentication measures on the Site or any network connected to the Site. You may not reverse look-up, trace or seek to trace any information on any other user of or visitor to the Site, or any other User, to its source, or exploit the Site or any service or information made available or offered by or through the Site, in any way where the purpose is to reveal any information, including but not limited to personal identification or information, other than your own information, as provided for by the Site. or
  • misrepresent yourself, your age or your affiliation with any person or entity, including the creation of duplicate or false Profiles of any kind or nature.

Protecting Copyrights and Other Intellectual Property. If you believe your work has been copied and posted on or through the Site in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, or any other infringement of your intellectual property rights, please contact us at abuse@anime-planet.com.

Disclaimers. We have implemented commercially-reasonable technical and organizational measures designed to secure data and information from accidental loss and from unauthorized access, use, alteration or disclosure. However, we cannot guarantee that such measures will never be defeated or that your personal information will never be used for improper purposes.

You use any information which you gather from third party Users' content at your own risk. Although we provide rules, including the TOU, for use of the Site, we do not control and assume no responsibility for what Users may post, upload, transmit, share, store or otherwise make available on the Site. Further, Anime-Planet is not responsible for the conduct of any User on the Site or offline.

The Site and Your Content may not be available from time to time for scheduled maintenance and for other reasons. We are not responsible for any damages whatsoever as a result of the Site not being available. Further, we are not responsible for any hacking, hijacking, or other manipulation of the Site, or for any resulting damages, or for any loss of data (including but not limited to any loss that results in loss of your Content). Finally, we are not responsible for any failure of software, telecommunications equipment, computer hardware, computer systems or servers, technology services, or any other related product or service and we assume no liability for injury or damage relating to the use of the Site or downloading of any technology of the Site. Under no circumstances will Anime-Planet be responsible for any damage or loss to a User, including personal injury or death, resulting from or related to a User's use of the Site, or any Third Party Content posted thereto.

THE SITE PROVIDED "AS-IS." YOU BEAR THE RISK OF USING IT. WE GIVE NO EXPRESS WARRANTIES, GUARANTEES OR CONDITIONS. YOU MAY HAVE ADDITIONAL CONSUMER RIGHTS UNDER YOUR LOCAL LAWS WHICH THIS AGREEMENT CANNOT CHANGE. TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED UNDER YOUR LOCAL LAWS, ANIME-PLANET EXCLUDES THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
